short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks the results of your matches and adds a RP filter to your card collection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
While active, the extension tracks your Genesis League Goals match and logs it in a database.
All the results can than be seen at moenke.org.

In your card collection, you can now see the RP of the players and sort by RP.

Your team site shows RP, LVL and also HP when its lower than 20%

Team Health is only calculated by starting lineup and subs!

Flip all team cards at once!
